MOC_Api_Abstract::provides ( $  method  ) 

Method invoked by MOC_Api_Service

If the method returns true, the MOC_Api_Service object calls invoke on this object

boolean

MOC_Api_Abstract::invoke ( $  method,
$  data 
)

Request to invoke an API method from the MOC_Api_Service

1) validate (Required: Validate parameters) 2) initialize (Optional: intiailize objects and variables for invoke) 3) invoke (Required: Of the actual method) 4) after (Optional: Post process the data from invoke)

Parameters:
string $method
array $data
Returns:
string

Implements MOC_Api_Service_Interface.

MOC_Api_Abstract::getMethodName ( $  name,
$  prefix = 'execute' 
) [protected]

Convert an API method to an internal method

  • Removes PREFIX from name
  • Replaces all dots with spaces
  • UpperCamelCases all words
  • Replaces all spaces with nothing
  • Prefixes name with "execute""

Parameters:
string $name
Returns:
string
